description: Italian businesses are crumbling in the crisis, leaving a familiar "benefactor" to fill the vacuum.
title: Coronavirus: The lure of mafia money during the crisis
title_page: Coronavirus: The lure of mafia money during the crisis - BBC News
maintext: He is expecting to get an offer he can't refuse. It's all very straightforward, he says. A mafioso knocks on your door and offers to buy your business, there and then. That's when you negotiate on the price. Then, someone transfers part of the money into your account, and the rest you get in cash.
